entries.content: Objections are not rejections; they are requests for more information.
entries.notes: Emphasizes reframing objections as opportunities to provide value.

entries.content: Ask questions based on the prospect's words to keep the conversation flowing.
When a prospect says 'I don't like cold calls,' challenge them with a question to engage further.
entries.notes: Shows turning skepticism into a dialogue.

entries.content: If you don't see the value, feel free to say no—you can't hurt my feelings.
Treat every objection as a chance to learn more about the prospect's needs.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
